name: Ningriptzu
description:
Go vote Ningriptzu for #gbjam :http://jams.gamejolt.io/gbjam4/games/ningriptzu/86715

With the most in depth story and some of the easiest levels in platforming history, Ningriptzu will give you a calm, joy filled player experience, that will definately not end with you getting mad at the develpoper for being such an ass and making a damn hard game. Yeah, definately not that.*

Featuring:

  • Story Mode, with over 20 rage-inducing levels, that you will 'love'.**
  • Boss battles so difficult that the only way to really defeat them is to just turn the game off.
  • Constant updates as the game is expanded after the jam is over.
  • Amazing art by the one and only Kenney (http://www.kenney.nl/).
  • A story so in depth and heartwarming that it will make you want to hug, cry, and scream at the game.
  • Rice balls. Lots, and lots of rice balls.

Made by David. (@LittleSadNerd) using GameMaker: Studio, for #gbjam .

*Opening statement may contain incorrect description depicting the game's level of difficulty.
**Number of levels is subject to most likely increase by the time you actually play the game.
